title: Part 316 - MARKING PRODUCTS AND THEIR CONTAINERS
content:
Part 316 - MARKING PRODUCTS AND THEIR CONTAINERS
State Regulations
§ 316.4 - Marking devices; to be furnished by official establishments; control of, version 2
§ 316.5 - Branding ink; to be furnished by official establishments; approval by department; color, version 2
§ 316.8 - Unmarked inspected products; moved between official establishments; transported, version 2
§ 316.9 - Products to be marked with official marks, version 2
§ 316.10 - Marking of meat food products with official inspection legend and ingredient statement, version 2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
